TopicTitle: I need a few more mods [PIC]

Articles.Content:
Just one more. I can stop anytime I want.

This is the screenshot I use when I setup KSP, so I know the windows won't overlap when I need them later. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

The pic also doesn't show Time Control, now that we have an unofficial version for 1.0.2. That goes over the patch of empty on the left... Plenty of room left. Isn't there supposed to be a spaceship somewhere in this game?
